data.label: Normal
data.description: Starts off slow, but progressively gets faster. Meant for beginners.

data.label: Trial
data.description: You're ranked based on how well you play. Meant for players of all skill level.

data.label: Virtuoso
data.description: Insanely fast stacking and dangerous obstacles. Can you keep up? Meant for professional players.

data.label: Excavator
data.description: Clear all the gems before the time runs out! Meant for players of all skill level.

data.label: Normal II
data.description: If you beat Normal, try this.

data.label: Trial II
data.description: If you beat Trial, try this.

data.label: Virtuoso II
data.description: If you beat Virtuoso, try this.

data.label: Excavator II
data.description: If you beat Excavator, try this.

data.description: Import and export your settings here
